title: Gemma Collins convinced her boobs have supernatural powers like Eleven from Stranger Things
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Gemma Collins reckons she's got supernatural abilities that make her as powerful as Stranger Things character Eleven.

The GC says she can tell she's got magical qualities because her breasts "get heavy on the full moon".

The former TOWIE stars details her special talents on her BBC podcast The Diva Forever.

Gemma declared that she could "see and feel things that others didn't" when she was younger, and now that she's 38, her breasts let her know whenever the moon is full.

She compares herself to powerful fictional youngster Eleven, from the hit Netflix show, who has psychokinetic abilities.

She says on her podcast: "When I was younger like I didn’t really understand that I could feel things that maybe other people didn't or see things that other people didn't.

(Image: Getty)

"It's only when I watched Stranger Things… now I feel like Millie Bobby Brown and I get it."

Gemma is a big believer in the supernatural and has spent thousands on psychic readings.

In a scene in her show Diva Forever, it even appeared she had a psychic on retainer as she called up a woman to ask questions about her future during a discussion about her living situation.

(Image: Netflix)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

She added: "I don’t know about you but my breasts get so heavy on a full moon. Literally I can barely move.

"They fill with water. When I looked into this, the moon’s made up of water and that can affect water within."

Gemma also talked about her belief in aliens.

(Image: Instagram)

She said: "Aliens if you can hear me please, I've got lots of land here where we live.

"There's lots of green fields. Land your UFOs where I live, I wanna talk to you, I wanna hug you, I wanna meet you. I’m not scared of aliens."

description: The former TOWIE star says she knows she's got magical abilities because her breasts "get heavy" during the full moon
